p: The first principal component F1, which accounted for 17.5% of the total variance, was positively correlated with eucalyptol (0.85), the major compound found in EOs of eucalyptus and Chinese yin yang, and with d-limonene (0.70), the main compound found in EOs of bitter orange and pepper. The F2, explaining 16.1% of the total variance, was positively correlated with carvacrol (0.9), the most abundant compound found in oregano EOs.
